concept.title: Grayscale Palettes
concept.shortdesc: A grayscale palette is a range of shades from black to white, featuring only variations in gray without any color hue

conbody.p: A grayscale palette contains only black, white, and gray. The gray has multiple levels to reflect differences in shade, depth, and shadows. Grayscale palettes are often used in design, photography, and art to emphasize contrast, tone, and composition without the distraction of color.
